effect.gold_silver: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.crystal: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.gold_silver: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.crystal: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.gold_silver: Scares wild foes to end battle.
flavor_text.crystal: Scares wild foes to end battle.
